MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA21 postcode area of Saltcoats. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:00am due to a faulty roadside pillar opposite 1 Arthurlie Place and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:15am on Thursday, 22 April 2021
